artist: Artist: Alex Katz; Publisher: Peter Blum Edition, New York
creditline: Gift of David and Lisa Erickson
description: black pigment on cream paper; thick black Y-shaped lines to right side of center form tree trunk; thick black lines form tree trunks in center and background; black abstract shapes along bottom, left and right sides suggest foliage; cream spaces in middle between trees; paper has rough edges

title: Landscapes
